ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'
name: wxmpl

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "wxmpl" %}
{% set version = "2.3.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/NOAA-ORR-ERD/wxmpl/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 63885c7f8728770bea73aeaf18ae11ca5afd39e29d637305ed5b5e0750ce57bc

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy
    - wxpython
    - matplotlib-base

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - wxmpl

about:
  home: https://github.com/NOAA-ORR-ERD/wxmpl
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  dev_url: https://github.com/NOAA-ORR-ERD/wxmpl
  summary: 'Painless matplotlib embedding in wxPython'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ChrisBarker-NOAA
